TunableEnum.name: RETAIL_CUSTOMER_SITUATION_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The tag associated with customer situations.

TunableEnum.name: RETAIL_EMPLOYEE_SITUATION_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The tag associated with employee situations.

TunableList.name: RETAIL_INVENTORY_TYPES
TunableList.description: A reference to the inventory types of retail inventories. If a retail item gets put into any inventory type in this list, it will automatically be marked for sale.
